name: @wiesemann-theis/node-red-contrib-wut
description: Integrate Wiesemann & Theis products - like Com-Servers, Web-IOs or Web-Thermometers - into Node-RED.
author: Wiesemann & Theis GmbH <info@wut.de> (https://www.wut.de/)

scripts.test-prerelease: npm run lint & npm run test-once
scripts.test-build: npm run lint & mocha test/**/*_spec.js --reporter dot --exit
scripts.coverage: nyc npm run test-once && nyc report --reporter=text-lcov | coveralls
scripts.coverage-local: nyc npm run test-once && nyc report
